name: Sound Forge Pro Project
summary: Learn about .FRG files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Sound Forge Pro is a professional audio waveform editor for recording, editing, and analyzing audio. It can also design sound for videos, produce samples, and digitize and restore old recordings.
When creating an audio composition, you can save your progress as an FRG file to preserve your edits and settings. You can then close and reopen the FRG project file for further editing.
NOTE: Sonic Foundry initially developed Sound Forge Pro until Sony acquired it in 2003. Then, MAGIX acquired Sound Forge Pro in 2016.
